original_title: Michigan's Gray Wolf: Ghost of the Big Timber
overview: Describes the state of the gray wolf (Canis lupus) in Michigan, focusing on its resurgence in the Upper Peninsula. Presents various points of view regarding wolf management, and looks at various management issues, including wolf intolerance of other canids, attacks on livestock, and the number of wolves that should be in the Upper Peninsula.
title: Michigan's Gray Wolf: Ghost of the Big Timber
